name: StackPack
description:
Explore the futuristic warehouse picking up crates and dropping them in bays of the same colour.

You can pass through electric fences but not whilst carrying a crate.

Crates can be placed on conveyer belts to move them about.

Music Credits

"Garuna" by Inkedsplat
"Technology" by Caleb Micklus

Made for OFTJam

Follow me on Twitter
